hero.title: Dymitr Dworakowski
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: I specialize in creating modern web applications with experience in both frontend and backend development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! My name is Dymitr Dworakowski. I'm a Junior Full-Stack Developer with a passion for design and creating user-friendly web applications. With a foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I focus on building efficient and engaging digital experiences. Constantly striving to expand my skills, I enjoy working on projects that challenge me to grow and contribute to impactful solutions. Let's create something amazing together!
